section_title: IN-SESSION WORKSHOP - A FRAMEWORK FOR VARIOUS APPROACHES
sentences: Niclas Svenningsen, UNFCCC Secretariat, presented a technical paper (FCCC/TP/2012/4) drawing on recent workshop presentations and discussions, as well as party submissions following Decision 2/CP.17 (outcome of the work of the AWG-LCA), paragraphs 79-86.
